item.description:
Hey Boston Chihuahua Members!!!

As some of you already know, our long time venue Doggie Day has closed its doors. We're currently in the process of looking for a new indoor place. During warmer months we hold 2 meetups- one indoor and one outdoor. THIS EVENT IS OUTDOOR.

Suggestions? Questions?

 

Hope to see you all there!

-Aimee

 

PLEASE NOTE THE DATE WAS CHANGED FROM THE 8TH TO THE 15TH IN OBSERVANCE OF EASTER.
item.how_to_find_us: About 2 streets over from doggie day, pet park is to the left of the basketball courts
item.name: April 2012 Outdoor Meetup
